alert.note: Alert for Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 28 at 7:05PM MDT until June 28 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CHEYENNE...KIMBALL AND EAST CENTRAL LARAMIE COUNTIES... At 704 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oliver Campground, or 15 miles west of Kimball, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Oliver Campground around 725 PM MDT. Oliver Reservoir around 730 PM MDT. Kimball and Kimball Airport around 755 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bushnell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 393 and 402. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 1 and 43. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
